channel.title: 4XX Client Developement
channel.description:
Been working on a client for shits and giggles for the past couple months,[s] I haven't gotten that much work time into it because of school plus having a job.[/s]I have a semester free, so I'm going to continue working on this. My overall goal is a to have a client that is user-friendly and is widely used. It'll be customized to my liking.
Base Client: Galkon's
• Adding character equipment support • Yellow tooltips for interfaces • Better renaming • Improved shadowing • Fixing missing lines on the minimap • 100k/m/b Enter amount • No blank username login • Fixing the online/offline "glitch" • Removed flames/RS Logo • Adding "loading - please wait" • Item dragging • Lava texture fixing • 474 Model support • Highly improved interfaces • Figured out the character clothing method, added more colors • Added 474 animations/maps • Figured out how the 377 client implements headicons and add it to my client
To do:
• Create new maps including a "home" • Toggle for support of 508+/474 models/animations • Continue to upgrade the 'speed' of the client
Cache Edits: • Replaced a lot of interfaces cache-sided • Fixed the lava texture • Other playerRights crowns • Replaced obj.idx/obj.dat
Recent renames (correct me if you have something better): • method336 to drawPixels • anIntArray1204 to charClothingColor2 (shirts2) • anIntArray1300 to charClothingColor
[quote="KroniKz_"]Nice nice nice nice. Good luck buddy! What server side are you using to test? Also, what do you mean by "better improved interfaces". Best of luck![/quote]Uh.. Like Before: [img]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z277/Tomboy1491/Runescape/oldplayercontrols2.jpg[/img]
After: [img]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z277/Tomboy1491/Runescape/oldplayercontrols.jpg[/img]
Finished: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2nv8dnd.jpg[/img]
^ and actually, that one I centered the house options on my newest one.
Lightning Warstaff: [IMG]http://i578.photobucket.com/albums/ss224/Tigerkrager/Warstaff_zps5298ca82.png[/img]
I packed the model into the cache, first time I'd done that in a couple years (took me a lil while to figure out).

item.title: 4XX Client Developement
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Been working on a client for shits and giggles for the past couple months, I haven’t gotten that much work time into it because of school plus having a job.I have a semester free, so I’m going to continue working on this. My overall goal is a to have a client that is user-friendly and is widely used. It’ll be customized to my liking.

Base Client: Galkon’s

• Adding character equipment support
• Yellow tooltips for interfaces
• Better renaming
• Improved shadowing
• Fixing missing lines on the minimap
• 100k/m/b Enter amount
• No blank username login
• Fixing the online/offline “glitch”
• Removed flames/RS Logo
• Adding “loading - please wait”
• Item dragging
• Lava texture fixing
• 474 Model support
• Highly improved interfaces
• Figured out the character clothing method, added more colors
• Added 474 animations/maps
• Figured out how the 377 client implements headicons and add it to my client

To do:

• Create new maps including a “home”
• Toggle for support of 508+/474 models/animations
• Continue to upgrade the ‘speed’ of the client

Cache Edits:
• Replaced a lot of interfaces cache-sided
• Fixed the lava texture
• Other playerRights crowns
• Replaced obj.idx/obj.dat

Recent renames (correct me if you have something better):
• method336 to drawPixels
• anIntArray1204 to charClothingColor2 (shirts2)
• anIntArray1300 to charClothingColor

[quote=“KroniKz_”]Nice nice nice nice. Good luck buddy! What server side are you using to test? Also, what do you mean by “better improved interfaces”. Best of luck![/quote]Uh… Like
